item.title: The Crimean War’s Lessons for War and Peace in Ukraine
item.description: History repeats itself in Ukraine, but we shouldn’t reenact it blindly.

item.title: Art Deco Knockouts, Velázquez, Hals, and More at the World’s Grandest Art Fair
item.description: In Maastricht in the Netherlands, the exhibition hall bursts with art treasures and connoisseurs, checkbooks in hand.

item.title: Trump’s Executive Order Targeting Perkins Coie Must Be Condemned
item.description: The president’s EO is nothing less than a bill of attainder, and a deep constitutional wrong.

item.title: Tax the Ivies
item.description: Republicans should make universities with big endowments and multibillion-dollar foundations pay more.
